name: SuckBot
short_description: SuckBot is an IRC bot written entirely from scratch, and entirely in C. Features include: RFC2229 Dictionary Queries, RFC Serving (via. DCC), Fortunes, Random Actions, Plugin support for time-driven events as well as "!/@" commands.
